review: Visited for my 8 year old who hadn't got his front teeth back in 8months. Dr Nisha explained very well the cause of delay and put my son and me at ease . She also recommended treatment to prevent the decay of tooth to avoid any root canal treatment. I was satisfied with my visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I attended Novadent, Mazagaon as a tooth where root canal was already done was super sensitive and I was in pain. After doing check up Dr. Ankesh explained the procedure, the costing and time that would taken for the treatment. 

The treatment of the re rootcanal was done by an external dentist and Dr. Nisha. The methodology and the manner in conducting the treatment was gentle and all times ensuring that there was minimal pain. I have to say that this was this first time that I experienced a 99% painless treatment. 
Of course there was pain (which is normal) post the first round of treatment as the tooth needs time to adjust and heal. 

Novadent ought to be your go to dentist for ppl in the area and outside. You would no doubt be treated with the capable hands of Dr. Nisha and Dr. Ankesh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My child was not ready to sit initially, so the doctor asked him what would he want to watch, and accordingly played his choice cartoon on the display to calm him down which kept him engrossed while doing the treatment, after completion of the treatment, the doctor gave him her certificate of bravery for his sitting tolerance, which encouraged the child to go back for the next treatment, if need arises.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Both the Doctors were really sweet and friendly and made my child really comfortable...had been to them before also and went right now also because I had a very good experience in the past with them which made me go to them again this time...thank you very much doctors...would recommend them to others...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nisha, was through and skilled. Did a great job with the RTC.  I had no pain post round one. Round two had a slight discomfort.  Manageable pain levels. She was focused on ensuring that the treatment was done well..
Thankyou Dr. Nisha. üëçüëç

Sherryann Das.
